Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指定要求網域名稱伺服器 (Domain Name Server) 中資訊的使用權限。

span.span: Specifies permission to request information from Domain Name Servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所宣告的安全性資訊會儲存在中繼資料的屬性，這個目標是要類別套用。The security information declared by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which the is applied. 系統接著會存取這項資訊在執行階段。The system then accesses this information at run time. 傳遞至建構函式會決定允許的 DNS 目標。The that is passed to the constructor determines the allowable DNS targets. 這些安全性屬性僅適用於使用[宣告式安全性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。These security attributes are used only for [Declarative Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8). 針對[命令式安全性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，使用對應類別。For [Imperative Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding class. 安全性存取完全限制，或完全不受限制。Security access is either fully restricted or fully unrestricted. 設定屬性，以`true`授與存取權，或`false`針對沒有存取權。Set the property to `true` to grant access, or `false` for no access. 設定此屬性做為具名參數。Set this property as a named parameter. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用来套用的自訂類別的宣告式安全性。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. [!code-cpp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞至這個建構函式的值會指定允許目標。The value that is passed to this constructor specifies the allowable targets. ## Examples 下列範例會使用来套用的自訂類別的宣告式安全性。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. [!code-cpp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立並傳回 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A that corresponds to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CreatePermission`由安全性系統，不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫方法。The `CreatePermission` method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全性資訊會儲存在中繼資料的屬性，這個目標是要類別套用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系統接著會存取執行的階段和呼叫資訊。The system then accesses the information at run time and calls . 系統會使用傳回來強制執行指定的安全性需求。The system uses the returned to enforce the specified security requirements.
